title: Google launches Whisk AI-image generator: How is different from others - The Times of India
summary:
Google Launches Whisk AI-Image Generator: What Sets It Apart?

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Tech News Daily

Google has introduced its latest AI-image generator, Whisk, which aims to revolutionize the way users create images. This article explores the unique features of Whisk compared to other AI-image generators currently available.

  • Whisk leverages advanced neural networks for more realistic image creation.
  • It allows users to specify detailed attributes for images, enhancing customization.
  • Whisk integrates seamlessly with other Google services, improving accessibility and usability.
  • The generator is designed for both amateur and professional users, ensuring versatility.
"Whisk represents a significant leap forward in AI technology, making image creation more intuitive than ever before." - Google Spokesperson

In conclusion, Whisk is set to redefine the landscape of AI image generation, providing users with unprecedented control and creativity.
newTitle: Google Launches Whisk AI Image Generator: What Sets It Apart?

summary:
Indian art market is one of the most exciting we've seen in recent years: Christie’s CEO Cerutti

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Company Business News

The Indian art market continues to gain international recognition, with notable sales and records set during recent auctions.

  • The Lovers by Souza sold for $4.89 million, establishing a new record for the artist.
  • This year marks the centenary of the artist's birth.
  • Christie's recognizes the growth and potential of the Indian art scene.
'The Lovers', a tender visual representation, continues to captivate buyers.

The success of recent auctions suggests a bright future for Indian artists in the global marketplace.
newTitle: Excitement in Indian Art Market: Insights from Christie's CEO Cerutti

title: OpenAI brings its o1 reasoning model to its API — for certain developers - TechCrunch
summary:
OpenAI brings its o1 reasoning model to its API — for certain developers

Publication Date: September 12, 2024 | Source: TechCrunch

OpenAI is introducing its new “reasoning” AI model, o1, to its API, beginning with select developers in its “tier 5” category. This development allows for improved fact-checking capabilities, albeit with higher costs and longer processing times compared to previous models.

  • o1 will roll out to developers who spend at least $1,000 with OpenAI.
  • It replaces the o1-preview model and offers enhanced customization features.
  • OpenAI charges $15 for analysis and $60 for generation per ~750,000 words.
  • The model is designed to provide more accurate responses, particularly for programming and business inquiries.
  • OpenAI plans to expand access to additional usage tiers soon.
“We are rolling out access incrementally while working to expand access to additional usage tiers and ramping up rate limits,” OpenAI stated.

This launch demonstrates OpenAI's commitment to advancing AI capabilities while also addressing the demand for more powerful and customizable tools for developers.
newTitle: OpenAI Launches o1 Reasoning Model in API for Select Developers

title: Google DeepMind Leads the AGI Race, Outpacing OpenAI and Rivals - AIM
summary:
Google DeepMind Leads the AGI Race, Outpacing OpenAI and Rivals

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

Google has unveiled its latest generative AI models, Veo 2 and Imagen 3, aiming to outpace OpenAI and other competitors in the race to achieve Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).

  • OpenAI's CEO recently highlighted the significance of video in realizing AGI with the launch of Sora.
  • Google's Veo models perform exceptionally well in internal tests, outperforming rivals in quality and adherence to prompts.
  • The models handle complex video elements like reflections and shadows with improved clarity.
  • Veo 2 features advanced cinematic understanding, achieving lifelike visuals with reduced artifacts.
  • The model will be available through API by early next year, offering various enhancements over its predecessor.
  • Google leverages its YouTube platform for training models, giving it a competitive edge.
“It’s not perfect, but it’s a significant improvement over current state-of-the-art models.” - Shlomi Fruchter, Veo co-lead at Google DeepMind

As Google accelerates its agenda towards AGI, the firm continues to make significant strides and innovations in generative AI technologies, marking a pivotal moment in the tech landscape.
newTitle: Google DeepMind Leads the AGI Race, Outpacing OpenAI and Rivals

Motorola unveils Moto G15, G15 Power and Moto G05 with big batteries - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
summary:
Motorola unveils Moto G15, G15 Power and Moto G05 with big batteries

Publication Date: Today, Source: Motorola News

Motorola unveiled three new additions to its Moto G lineup today. The Moto G15, Moto G15 Power, and Moto G05 are entry-level phones boasting significant battery capacity and the latest Android 15 software.

  • The Moto G15 Power features a 6,000 mAh battery, while the G15 has a 5,200 mAh capacity.
  • Both G15 variants share a 6.72" Full HD+ LCD, 50 MP main camera, and 5 MP ultrawide camera.
  • The Moto G05 includes a 64 GB or 128 GB storage option with a smaller 6.67" HD+ LCD.
  • All models come with dual SIM support, a 3.5 mm audio jack, and various color options.
“Motorola has yet to share any details about pricing or launch dates, but confirms international availability.”

Motorola continues to expand its Moto G series, catering to users seeking powerful battery life and essential smartphone features.
newTitle: Motorola Unveils New Moto G15 Series with Impressive Battery Life

Poco launches M7 Pro and India’s cheapest 5G phone Poco C75 - The Hindu
summary:
Poco Launches M7 Pro and India's Most Affordable 5G Phone C75

Date: December 17, 2024

Source: The Hindu

Poco has launched two new smartphones in India - the Poco C75, which is touted as the cheapest 5G phone in India, and the Poco M7 Pro, aimed at the mid-segment market.

  • The Poco C75 features a 6.88-inch display with a peak brightness of 600 nits and is powered by a 5,160 mAh battery.
  • It operates on a Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 chipset, comes with up to 4 GB RAM and 128 GB storage.
  • The phone is priced at ₹7,999 and will be available on Flipkart starting December 19.
  • The Poco M7 Pro offers a 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED display with a 120 Hz refresh rate, powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra chipset.
  • It features a 5,110 mAh battery and comes with up to 8 GB RAM and 256 GB storage, starting at ₹13,999.
  • The M7 Pro will be available on Flipkart starting December 20.
“Poco has promised 2 years of OS updates and 4 years of security updates for both models.”

The launch of these budget-friendly smartphones is expected to bolster Poco's presence in the competitive Indian 5G market.
newTitle: Poco Launches M7 Pro and India's Most Affordable 5G Phone C75

summary:
Realme 14x 5G Official Launch Date In India Confirmed

Date: December 18 | Source: Zee News

The Realme 14x 5G smartphone is set to launch in India as a successor to the Realme 13 Pro, featuring a new chipset and camera enhancements.

  • The phone will be available in three colors: Crystal Black, Golden Glow, and Jewel Red.
  • Expected storage options: 6GB + 128GB, 8GB + 128GB, and 8GB + 256GB.
  • The anticipated starting price is Rs 11,999, with availability post-launch on Realme’s website and Flipkart.
  • It will feature a 6.67-inch HD+ display and MediaTek Dimensity 6300 5G chipset.
  • The smartphone promises a robust 6,000mAh battery with 45W fast charging.
  • Photography improvements include a 50MP primary camera.
  • Enhanced 5G connectivity features with a promised 115% stronger signal.
“Fall-proof” design with military-grade shock resistance.

The Realme 14x 5G is shaping up to be a compelling budget smartphone with promising specifications, appealing design options, and competitive pricing in the Indian market.
newTitle: Realme 14x 5G Launch Date Announced for India

Apple unveils 2024 top App Store charts: Most downloaded apps, games in India - The Financial Express
summary:
Apple Unveils 2024 Top App Store Charts: Most Downloaded Apps and Games in India

Publication Date: December 12, 2024

Source: Financial Express

As 2024 comes to a close, Apple has released its year-end charts showcasing the most downloaded apps and games on the App Store in India.

  • The year-end charts highlight both free and paid apps, along with popular Apple Arcade games.
  • Top paid iPhone games include Minecraft: Play with Friends and Hitman Sniper.
  • Top free games feature BATTLEGROUNDS MOBILE INDIA and Ludo King.
  • In paid apps, Forest: Focus for Productivity is a standout, while free apps include social media giants like WhatsApp and Instagram.
  • iPad charts mirrored iPhone, with highlights in creative apps.
  • Apple Arcade continues to thrive with exclusive titles attracting gaming enthusiasts.
“These rankings provide a snapshot of the apps and games that defined 2024 for Indian users.”

Apple's 2024 App Store charts underline the importance of mobile apps in technology and entertainment, shaping user experiences across India.
newTitle: Apple Unveils 2024 Top App Store Charts: Most Downloaded Apps and Games in India

Poco unveils M7 Pro and C75 with 5G chipsets and Sony cameras: Check price, specs and other details - The Indian Express
summary:
Poco unveils M7 Pro and C75 with 5G chipsets, Sony cameras: Check price, specs and other details

Publication Date: Today
Source: Indian Express

Poco has launched two new budget smartphones, the M7 Pro and C75, with 5G capabilities and Sony cameras, targeting budget-conscious consumers.

  • The Poco M7 Pro features Dimensity 7025 Ultra chipset and a 6.67-inch 120Hz gOLED screen with FullHD+ resolution and HDR10+ support.
  • It includes a dual rear camera with a 50MP Sony camera and a 20MP selfie shooter, along with a 5,110mAh battery supporting 45W fast charging.
  • The Poco C75 is powered by Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 chipset, has a 6.88-inch 120Hz LCD screen, and features a 50MP rear camera.
  • Both models run on Xiaomi's HyperOS based on Android 14 and promise multiple years of software updates.
  • The M7 Pro is priced at Rs 13,999 for the 6GB+128GB model and Rs 15,999 for the 8GB+256GB variant, while the C75 starts at Rs 7,999.
“Poco M7 Pro will get two years of Android updates and four years of security patches.”

The new models emphasize enhanced camera capabilities and display quality, catering to users looking for budget-friendly smartphones with powerful features.
newTitle: Poco unveils M7 Pro and C75 with 5G chipsets, Sony cameras: Check price, specs and other details

Realme to launch budget friendly smartphone 14x 5G on Wednesday - United News of India
summary:
Realme to launch budget friendly smartphone 14x 5G on Wednesday

Posted at: Dec 17 2024 5:10PM | Source: UNI

Hyderabad, Dec 17 (UNI) Realme, the most popular smartphone brand among Indian youth, is all set to launch its budget friendly model, the realme 14x 5G, in India on Wednesday. This will be a groundbreaking addition to its smartphone portfolio.

  • The realme 14x 5G features segment’s first IP69 Dust & Water Resistance and Military-Grade Shock Resistance.
  • It includes a massive 6000mAh battery with 45W charging.
  • Innovative features like SonicWave Water Ejection and Rainwater Smart Touch have been introduced.
  • It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 5G Chipset, ensuring a smooth user experience.
  • The smartphone comes in three colors: Crystal Black, Golden Glow, and Jewel Red, with storage options of 6GB+128GB and 8GB+128GB.
“With its industry-first IP69 rating under 15K, massive battery, and innovative features, the realme 14x 5G offers an unparalleled experience for users seeking a durable and reliable device,” said a realme spokesperson.

This launch reinforces Realme's commitment to providing cutting-edge technology at accessible price points, aiming to resonate with young users.

title: iPhone 16 available at the price of iPhone 15, find out where to buy - India TV News
summary:
iPhone 16 available at the price of iPhone 15, find out where to buy

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: India TV News

The iPhone 16, only months after its release, is now available at the same price as the iPhone 15. Consumers can find significant discounts on Amazon, while Flipkart maintains the original price.

  • The iPhone 16 is listed for as low as Rs 77,400 on Amazon.
  • There is an additional instant discount of up to Rs 5,000, leading to a final price of Rs 72,400.
  • Three storage options are available: 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB.
  • Features include a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A18 Bionic chip, and AI capabilities.
  • The dual-camera system includes a 48MP main camera and supports USB Type-C fast charging.
“If you're looking to snag the iPhone 16, which features AI capabilities, now is a great time to take advantage of the offer.”

As the iPhone 16 competes with the iPhone 15, this significant price drop presents an exciting opportunity for consumers.
newTitle: iPhone 16 Launch Price Matches iPhone 15: Where to Buy

title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Global Launch Date Leaked Ahead of Official Announcement - Gadgets 360
summary:
OnePlus 13 and 13R Set to Launch on January 7, 2025

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Gadgets 360

The OnePlus 13 series, including the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, is confirmed to launch globally on January 7, 2025, during the company's Winter Launch Event. The series is expected to mirror the features of the previously launched Chinese version.

  • The OnePlus 13 series will debut in India and select markets on January 7, 2025, at 9pm IST.
  • The OnePlus 13R is anticipated to be a rebadged OnePlus Ace 5.
  • Available colors for the OnePlus 13 include Arctic Dawn, Black Eclipse, and Midnight Ocean.
  • Specifications feature a 6.82-inch Quad-HD+ LTPO AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, up to 24GB RAM, and 6,000mAh battery.
“The flagship model is expected to be accompanied by the OnePlus 13R.”

The upcoming OnePlus 13 series is generating excitement among fans and tech enthusiasts as it aims to deliver high-end specifications with color variety.
newTitle: OnePlus 13 and 13R Set to Launch on January 7, 2025
